Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are considered as one of the most promising power-generation technologies.
Titulo: State of the art ceria-carbonate composites (3C) electrolyte for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs)

Sentencas: However, the current high operation temperature (800-1000 degrees C) of SOFCs impedes their commercialization significantly.
Titulo: State of the art ceria-carbonate composites (3C) electrolyte for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs)

Sentencas: A key requirement for reducing the operation temperature of SOFCs is to improve the performance of the electrolyte at such low temperature.
Titulo: State of the art ceria-carbonate composites (3C) electrolyte for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs)

Sentencas: Recently, ceria-based composite materials, especially ceria-carbonate composites (3C), have been developed as competitive electrolyte candidates for SOFCs operated below 600 degrees C, which resulted in an emerging R & D upsurge followed up by worldwide activities.
Titulo: State of the art ceria-carbonate composites (3C) electrolyte for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs)

Sentencas: This report gives a short review on current worldwide activities on 3C for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs), which mainly based on recent more than 70 publications since 2010.
Titulo: State of the art ceria-carbonate composites (3C) electrolyte for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs)

Sentencas: It gives an overview of materials composition and microstructure, multi-ion conduction effects, durability of the 3C materials in the areas of LTCFC or joint SOFC/MCFC filed, as well as some other novel applications of the 3C materials.
Titulo: State of the art ceria-carbonate composites (3C) electrolyte for advanced low temperature ceramic fuel cells (LTCFCs)
